wikipedia_page.main: Everley Gregg (26 October 1903, in Bishopstoke, Hampshire – 9 June 1959, in Beaconsfield, Buckinghamshire) was an English actress.  Early in her career, she became associated especially with plays of Noël Coward.  She began making films in the 1930s and added television roles in her last decade; she acted until her last year.
